articles.title: China FM warns US not to create bigger problems - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): State Councillor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi (pic) called on the United States to redress its wrongdoings on the Taiwan question and warned it not to act rashly to avoid creating bigger crisis on Friday (Aug 5).
articles.content: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): State Councillor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi (pic) called on the United States to redress its wrongdoings on the Taiwan question and warned it not to act ras… [+3602 chars]

articles.title: Singapore's sexagenarian model Ong Bee Yan launches an ageless fashion capsule with local label - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The 66-year-old Singaporean style icon teamed up with Yacht 21 to create a collection that shows style doesn’t have to be pigeonholed by age.
articles.content: When I reached 50, I couldnt find clothes I felt comfortable in. I didnt want to wear clothes that my mum used to wear when she was 50 years old. At the end of the day, I just got stuck with like sho… [+1257 chars]

articles.title: Major Punjabi feature film shot in B.C. ghost town explores history of province's first Sikh settlers - CBC.ca
articles.description: Chhalla Mud Ke Nahi Aaya — Chhalla Never Returned — follows the story of a Punjabi man and the difficult working conditions he faces after migrating to Canada to earn a living. The movie, filmed in B.C., is based on the true stories of South Asian migrants wh…
articles.content: In the early 1900s, a young man travels to Canada to earn money for his family back home. After joining a small group of fellow Punjabis working in a lumber mill, he is faced with difficult working c… [+4164 chars]

articles.title: 'Am I looking like a man?' How Farhanna Farid overcame self-doubt to become a record-breaking powerlifter - AsiaOne
